subject: Re: [junit] coverage testing
msgSnippet: ... I might find it useful, but I don t think I d want the Coverage suite running with my programmer tests, because I don t believe that 100% coverage
messageBody:
Eugene Kuleshov wrote:

> I'd like to hear opinions on the idea of raising test failures for
> code not covered by tests right from the tests.

I might find it useful, but I don't think I'd want the Coverage suite
running with my programmer tests, because I don't believe that 100%
coverage (whatever that means) is a requirement to check code in.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
